help-file.title: "CHANT OF SUBVERSION"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: Room Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of singer Type of song: Enchantment
A successful verse of this song will cause those charmed pets in the room, both grouped and ungrouped to possibly become charmed. A victim affected by this song becomes charmed until charm breaks or victim is killed.
